Pop Culture.name: Rewind & Replay: A Pop Culture Time Capsule
Pop Culture.description: Test your knowledge of iconic moments, trends, and figures that have shaped our cultural landscape. From music and movies to internet phenomena and beyond, this quiz will challenge your memory and celebrate the evolution of pop culture. Are you a true aficionado or just a casual observer? Let's find out!

questions.text: What was the original name of the popular dance craze, 'The Macarena'?
questions.hint: Think about the Spanish origins of the song and dance.

questions.text: Which streaming service famously debuted the original series 'House of Cards' in 2013, significantly impacting the landscape of television distribution?
questions.hint: This platform was a major disruptor in the entertainment industry.

questions.text: What was the defining characteristic of the 'Harlem Shake' internet meme that went viral in 2013?
questions.hint: It involved a sudden shift in behavior and music.
questions.option3: A brief, chaotic dance sequence following a short, static intro

questions.text: Which social media platform, initially designed for college students, became a global phenomenon and a primary source for news and viral content?

questions.text: What was the name of the fictional country featured in the Marvel film 'Black Panther'?
questions.hint: It's a technologically advanced nation in Africa.

questions.text: Which artist popularized the 'Bottle Flip' challenge on social media?
questions.hint: This challenge involved flipping a water bottle and having it land upright.

questions.text: What was the primary function of the 'Tamagotchi' virtual pet craze of the 1990s?
questions.hint: It involved caring for a digital creature.
questions.option3: Simulating the care and feeding of a virtual pet

questions.hint: It's a sarcastic and self-deprecating remark.
questions.option3: Could I *be* wearing any more clothes?
